Name: Bobbi Adventure
About the game: Bobbi Adventure is a 2D platform game where you, as a kind-hearted dwarf Bobby, roam the fantasy world in search of apples, on the way Bobbi meets the defenders of the apple forest, defeat them and collect all the apples in the forest. be vigilant on the way you will meet very strong enemies who will not let you collect all the apples. Features: - Nice graphics by Reatorg - Nice soundtrack by Reatorg 25 lvl
